article: two lawmakers from the ruling kuomintang -lrb- kmt -rrb- and the opposition democratic progressive party -lrb- dpp -rrb- on wednesday strongly opposed a plan by the executive yuan to relocate the sports affairs council -lrb- sac -rrb- and the fisheries agency -lrb- fa -rrb- to taipei .
abstract: two lawmakers oppose plan to relocate two cabinet units to taipei
